verbose_text: Apoptosis was inhibited by PP1-12 (0.3, 1 and 3 mumol/l), as shown by a reduction in nuclear condensation (XREF_FIG), but also, by the increase in mitochondrial membrane potential (XREF_FIG) and the decrease in actin cytoskeleton content (XREF_FIG); these changes were significant at a concentration of 3 mumol/l PP1-12 (XREF_FIG).
